TestCase.name: q1
TestCase.Resource: select l_returnflag, l_linestatus, sum(l_quantity) as sum_qty, sum(l_extendedprice) as sum_base_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) as sum_disc_price, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount) * (1 + l_tax)) as sum_charge, avg(l_quantity) as avg_qty, avg(l_extendedprice) as avg_price, avg(l_discount) as avg_disc, count(*) as count_order from lineitem where l_shipdate <= date '1998-12-01' - interval '71' day group by l_returnflag, l_linestatus order by l_returnflag, l_linestatus;

RwBatchGather RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[0, 1]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$1], dir0=[ASC], dir1=[ASC]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchProject(l_returnflag=[$0], l_linestatus=[$1], sum_qty=[$2], sum_base_price=[$3], sum_disc_price=[$4], sum_charge=[$5], avg_qty=[/($6, $7)], avg_price=[/($8, $9)], avg_disc=[/($10, $11)], count_order=[$12]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1}], sum_qty=[SUM($2)], sum_base_price=[SUM($3)], sum_disc_price=[SUM($4)], sum_charge=[SUM($5)], agg#4=[SUM($6)], agg#5=[SUM($7)], agg#6=[SUM($8)], agg#7=[SUM($9)], agg#8=[SUM($10)], agg#9=[SUM($11)], agg#10=[SUM($12)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1}], sum_qty=[SUM($2)], sum_base_price=[SUM($3)], sum_disc_price=[SUM($4)], sum_charge=[SUM($5)], agg#4=[SUM($2)], agg#5=[COUNT($2)], agg#6=[SUM($3)], agg#7=[COUNT($3)], agg#8=[SUM($6)], agg#9=[COUNT($6)], count_order=[COUNT()]) RwBatchProject(l_returnflag=[$4], l_linestatus=[$5], l_quantity=[$0], l_extendedprice=[$1], $f4=[*($1, -(1, $2))], $f5=[*(*($1, -(1, $2)), +(1, $3))], l_discount=[$2]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[<=($6, -(1998-12-01, 6134400000:INTERVAL DAY))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_tax,l_returnflag,l_linestatus,l_shipdate])

TestCase.name: q2
TestCase.Resource: select s_acctbal, s_name, n_name, p_partkey, p_mfgr, s_address, s_phone, s_comment from part, supplier, partsupp, nation, region where p_partkey = ps_partkey and s_suppkey = ps_suppkey and p_size = 38 and p_type like '%TIN' and s_nationkey = n_nationkey and n_regionkey = r_regionkey and r_name = 'MIDDLE EAST' and ps_supplycost = ( select min(ps_supplycost) from partsupp, supplier, nation, region where p_partkey = ps_partkey and s_suppkey = ps_suppkey and s_nationkey = n_nationkey and n_regionkey = r_regionkey and r_name = 'MIDDLE EAST' ) order by s_acctbal desc, n_name, s_name, p_partkey LIMIT 100;

RwBatchGather RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[0 DESC, 2, 1, 3]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$0], sort1=[$2], sort2=[$1], sort3=[$3], dir0=[DESC], dir1=[ASC], dir2=[ASC], dir3=[ASC], fetch=[100]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1, 2, 3]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchProject(s_acctbal=[$24], s_name=[$20], n_name=[$27], p_partkey=[$5], p_mfgr=[$7], s_address=[$21], s_phone=[$23], s_comment=[$25]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($28, $0)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[=(CAST($1):CHAR(0), 'MIDDLE EAST':CHAR(11))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, region]], columns=[r_regionkey,r_name,r_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[25]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[AND(=($2, $0), =($14, $1))], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0}], EXPR$0=[MIN($1)]) RwBatchProject(ps_partkey=[$3], ps_supplycost=[$6]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($17, $0)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[=(CAST($1):CHAR(0), 'MIDDLE EAST':CHAR(11))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, region]], columns=[r_regionkey,r_name,r_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[14]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($5, $1)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($0)]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, partsupp]], columns=[ps_partkey,ps_suppkey,ps_availqty,ps_supplycost,ps_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($3, $7)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[3]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, supplier]], columns=[s_suppkey,s_name,s_address,s_nationkey,s_phone,s_acctbal,s_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, nation]], columns=[n_nationkey,n_name,n_regionkey,n_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 12]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($14, $10)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[10]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $9)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[AND(=($5, 38), LIKE($4, '%TIN':CHAR(4)), IS NOT NULL($0))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, part]], columns=[p_partkey,p_name,p_mfgr,p_brand,p_type,p_size,p_container,p_retailprice,p_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[IS NOT NULL($0)]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, partsupp]], columns=[ps_partkey,ps_suppkey,ps_availqty,ps_supplycost,ps_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($3, $7)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[3]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, supplier]], columns=[s_suppkey,s_name,s_address,s_nationkey,s_phone,s_acctbal,s_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, nation]], columns=[n_nationkey,n_name,n_regionkey,n_comment])

TestCase.name: q3
TestCase.Resource: select l_orderkey, sum(l_extendedprice * (1 - l_discount)) as revenue, o_orderdate, o_shippriority from customer, orders, lineitem where c_mktsegment = 'FURNITURE' and c_custkey = o_custkey and l_orderkey = o_orderkey and o_orderdate < date '1995-03-29' and l_shipdate > date '1995-03-29' group by l_orderkey, o_orderdate, o_shippriority order by revenue desc, o_orderdate LIMIT 10;

RwBatchGather RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[1 DESC, 2]]) RwBatchSort(sort0=[$1], sort1=[$2], dir0=[DESC], dir1=[ASC], fetch=[10]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1, 2]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchProject(l_orderkey=[$0], revenue=[$3], o_orderdate=[$1], o_shippriority=[$2]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1, 2}], revenue=[SUM($3)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0, 1, 2]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashAgg(group=[{0, 1, 2}], revenue=[SUM($3)]) RwBatchProject(l_orderkey=[$17], o_orderdate=[$12], o_shippriority=[$15], $f3=[*($22, -(1, $23))]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($0, $9)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[=(CAST($6):CHAR(0), 'FURNITURE':CHAR(9))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, customer]], columns=[c_custkey,c_name,c_address,c_nationkey,c_phone,c_acctbal,c_mktsegment,c_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[1]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchHashJoin(condition=[=($9, $0)], joinType=[inner]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[<($4, 1995-03-29)]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, orders]], columns=[o_orderkey,o_custkey,o_orderstatus,o_totalprice,o_orderdate,o_orderpriority,o_clerk,o_shippriority,o_comment]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=HASH_DISTRIBUTED, keys=[0]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[>($10, 1995-03-29)]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_orderkey,l_partkey,l_suppkey,l_linenumber,l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_tax,l_returnflag,l_linestatus,l_shipdate,l_commitdate,l_receiptdate,l_shipinstruct,l_shipmode,l_comment])

TestCase.name: q6
TestCase.Resource: select sum(l_extendedprice * l_discount) as revenue from lineitem where l_shipdate >= date '1994-01-01' and l_shipdate < date '1994-01-01' + interval '1' year and l_discount between 0.08 - 0.01 and 0.08 + 0.01 and l_quantity < 24;

RwBatchGather RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchSortAgg(group=[{}], revenue=[SUM($0)]) RwBatchExchange(distribution=[RwDistributionTrait{type=SINGLETON, keys=[]}], collation=[[]]) RwBatchSortAgg(group=[{}], revenue=[SUM($0)]) RwBatchProject($f0=[*($1, $2)]) RwBatchFilter(condition=[AND(>=($3, 1994-01-01), <(CAST($3):TIMESTAMP(0), +(1994-01-01, 12:INTERVAL YEAR)), OR(AND(>=($2, -(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))), <=($2, +(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2)))), AND(>=($2, +(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))), <=($2, -(0.08:DECIMAL(3,2), 0.01:DECIMAL(3,2))))), <($0, 24))]) RwBatchFilterScan(table=[[test_schema, lineitem]], columns=[l_quantity,l_extendedprice,l_discount,l_shipdate])
